name: HealingFacts
0:
”Alexa, open healing facts”
”Alexa, start healing facts”
”Alexa, ask healing facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: healing facts
des: Ask Alexa to read selected Bible healing scriptures. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next group of scriptures. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
